title: Service Agreement and Privacy Policy
message:
Please be sure to carefully read and fully understand the terms of the 'Service Agreement' and 'Privacy Policy', including but not limited to: In order to better provide you with services, we need to collect your device ID, operation logs and other information for analysis and optimization of application performance.

You can read the Service Agreement and Privacy Policy for more information. If you agree, please click the button below to start receiving our services.
